verbs.description: more people [V: are] opting for thanksgiving take - out restaurant dinners there a special kind of anxiety that derives from thanksgiving festivities particularly if you ’re the host beyond the tensions that may arise between guests and family members there also the mass chaos of cooking and cleaning paired with the post - meal aftermath of yet more cleaning and gently getting guests to leave your house thanksgiving national restaurant association restaurant
